Rooms.Title: The Temple Steps
Rooms.Description: You're standing on the temple steps.

Rooms.Title: The Temple Entrance
Rooms.Description: This is the temple entrance.  There is a doorway ahead that leads into the temple.  There are stairs to the south leading back into town.

Rooms.Title: The Temple Sanctuary
Rooms.Description: It is quiet and visitors amble about.  This is the temple sanctuary.  There is an exit to the south that leads outside.

Rooms.Title: The Town Square
Rooms.Description: The town square is full of merchants and citizens milling about.  To the north you see the temple steps.
